body_text: Can you elaborate on this? To support nested menus we need to call this recursively and spit out MenuItems an SubMenus as necessary, I'm not sure how this suggestion fits in to that.
body: Can you elaborate on this? To support nested menus we need to call this recursively and spit out `MenuItem`s an `SubMenu`s as necessary, I'm not sure how this suggestion fits in to that.
body_html: Can you elaborate on this? To support nested menus we need to call this recursively and spit out MenuItems an SubMenus as necessary, I'm not sure how this suggestion fits in to that.
